notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: R.C.G. conceived the study, wrote the manuscript and coordinated the field activities. R.C.G. and T.C. supervised the research activities. R.C.G., A.V., A.D. and L.F. collected the dendrochronological and biometric tree data. R.C.G., A.D., L.F., A.V. and G.B. analysed the dendrochronological data. T.C, G.B. and J.L. contributed to the discussion of the results and preparation of the manuscript. All authors revised and approved the final version of the manuscript.
